entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
